replies.author: 名字太难取
replies.txt_content: /setblock ~ ~ ~ 1（此为物品ID）可以在你所在的地方放一个石头

replies.author: haidaidw0307
replies.txt_content: 首先搭方块达到空中，再留下一个，其他撸掉

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Black_little
replies.txt_content:
创造模式：/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:stone（1.8）/setblock ~ ~ ~ 1(1.7)
生存模式：只有从地面（旁边）垫上来

replies.author: cfsdadsd
replies.txt_content:
创造飞到你要凭空搭方块的地方 
/setblock  物品ID
就可以在脚下生成一个 物品ID 的方块
